text: Winston & Strawn LLP is an international law firm. It is headquartered in Chicago. It has more than 975 attorneys in 10 offices in the United States and 5 offices in Europe, South America, and Asia. The company was founded in 1853. It is one of the largest and oldest law firms in Chicago. The company is known for its litigation and transactional practices across a variety of fields. ==References== Category:American law firms Category:1853 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Chicago
title: Winston Strawn
